instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Dead Sodomized by Liquid.
threads.message: Came in destroyed by liquid. J4501 destroyed SMC has crap all under it and liquid around CPU. Resistance between CPU Vcore and PPBUS is 7 ohms. Is this trash or worth looking at?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Dead Sodomized by Liquid.
threads.message: <CHIP>U7900</CHIP> is shorting <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> to ground. Screwed or possible to fix?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Dead Sodomized by Liquid.
threads.message: Actually nevermind it's not only shorted layers of the board are peeling right next to it. I'd say this is fucked.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Dead Sodomized by Liquid.
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Dead Sodomized by Liquid.
threads.message: Yeah giant hole between FET and PMIC when power applied it shoots out fire lmao
